item.description:
Rawbert's Organic Cafe
294 Cabot Street, Beverly, MA
978-922-0004
http://organicgardenc...

Rawbert's Organic Garden Cafe is the oldest raw food restaurant in the Boston area and is highly recommended by the Boston Raw Food Meetup group. The menu offers a wide range of choices.





-----------------------
There is a park on the ocean that we could visit afterwards if the weather is nice. Percy F. Lyons Park is only 6 blocks down Dane St. at the intersection of Dane St. and Lothrup St. To find it on a map, visit http://maps.google.co... and enter Percy F. Lyons Park, Beverly, MA or 111 Lothrup St., Beverly, MA.


-----------------------
For Boston Raw Food Group posted files, please check the files section
http://rawfood.meetup...

To promote the BRFG, please print out and post our tear-strip flyer
http://files.meetup.c...

For upcoming events, please check the calendar
http://rawfood.meetup...

For more information, please check the message board
http://rawfood.meetup...

For other raw events around New England, please visit
http://www.NewEngland... .

-------------------------

Posted by Daryl
item.name: Rawbert's
